text: Félix de Almeida Mendonça (March 23, 1928 – June 26, 2020), better known simply as Félix Mendonça, was a Brazilian politician and engineer. He was born in Conceição do Almeida, Bahia. He was a member of the Democratic Labour Party. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1983 to 1987 and again from 1991 to 2011. From 1963 to 1966, he was Mayor of Itabuna. On June 26, 2020, Mendonça died in Salvador, Bahia at the age of 92 from COVID-19. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Brazil Category:Civil engineers Category:Politicians from Bahia
title: Félix de Almeida Mendonça
